title: Vide-Grenier du Valais
intro: Every year, thousands of visitors come to Uvrier — a little suburb in the Canton of Valais — to visit this giant garage sale. The main purpose of the site is to collect registrations of participants.

title: Vertic-Halle
intro: Opened in 2012, this climbing gym immediately received a wide acclaim. The site allows visitors to learn about rates, courses and other practical information about the place.
